title: SnowDown in game Tease?
body: Occasionally when someone died on the rift during 2 games now they would momentarily become a block of ice for a split second b4 shattering. Just thought id make yall aware ;3.

replies.body: All-Star teaser. If you have the ice icon quipped [this](https://youtu.be/6LcmzqSChvY?t=42s) will happen when you kill enemies.
Ahh thankyou  for clearing that up :)
